name: Microzine 16
overview: "Microzine" is an educational disk-based magazine published by Scholastic between 1983 and 1992. Issue no. 16 is a double-sided disk that features "Tickets to America" and "Solar Pilot." The issue also containted "A Traveler's Guide to Fantastic Places," a database of real and fictional places. Finally, "Shift Shapes" is a jigsaw type puzzle game.
